feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.28.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Adding current user global ID binding by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13863
  • Adding test for globalId in self call by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13864

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.28.1...2.28.2

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.28.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix time-only form fields for internal db by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13865

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.28.2...2.28.3

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.28.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix CI build flakiness by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13867
  • Fix application deletion when SQS is enabled. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13868
  • Ignore SQS 500s on cleanup by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13872
  • Allow users to only specify a binding when adding attachments by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13819
  • Fix key value updates in patch by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13876

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.28.3...2.28.4

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.28.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • SQS migrations/app migrations by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13854
  • Enable SQS in dev ðŸŽ‰ by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13869
  • Update CouchDB image from 3.2.1 to 3.3.3. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13880
  • Remove rename test from mysql.spec.ts, it's covered in table.spec.ts by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13881
  • Modernise datasource.spec.ts by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13882
  • Move some mysql.spec.ts and postgres.spec.ts tests into datasource.spâ€¦ by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13883
  • Improving error logging of app migration system by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13887
  • Make sure nullable can be updated and then re-fetched by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13886
  • Fixing multi-tenant app migration issue by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13891
  • Slim down postgres.spec.ts, most of its content is tested elsewhere now across many datasources. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13895
  • Update SQS migration test to not create its own app context by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13900
  • Enable DataDog test instrumentation. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13901
  • App migration - make sure any issue is logged by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13905
  • Adding version to system status call by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13906
  • App migrations in API service by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13907
  • Better app migration queue startup process by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13908
  • Some potential app migration failure causes by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13909
  • Create Tenant endpoint + tenant_info doc by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13902
  • Disable app migration caching by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13911
  • Moving app migrations back to API service. by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13916
  • small change to ensure that name of datasources is available in dropdâ€¦ by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13915
  • Lock starting containers. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13914
  • Allow using an AWS_SESSION_TOKEN for object storage with AWS S3 by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13897
  • Bump braces from 3.0.2 to 3.0.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13912
  • Bump @azure/msal-node from 2.6.0 to 2.9.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13917
  • Bump @grpc/grpc-js from 1.8.21 to 1.8.22 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13925
  • Various QoL and table fixes by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13899
  • Remove deprecated unused endpoints by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13924

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.28.4...2.28.5

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.28.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Don't add or remove quotas for external DB rows by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13926

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.28.5...2.28.6
